Paragraph.Text: Scene headings are written in bold, with only 1 line of space before them. Act breaks are not delineated, nor are main titles. Key SOUNDS are written in all caps.
ELLIOT ALDERSON sits, wearing a hoodie, pondering.
I like to break the fourth wall and talk to the audience. It helps emphasize the fragility of my mental state.
MR. ROBOT lies in the seats across from Elliot, staring at him.
Does it help when you talk to them like that?
How did you know I was doing that?
Elliot closes his eyes and rubs his temples in confusion.
To answer both of your questions, I just do. Here’s where we drop a techie term or acronym that needs explaining, like how we’re AFK right now.
Elliot nods in agreement, albeit confused still.
Int. Allsafe offices - conference room - later
GIDEON GODDARD stands, lecturing his employees.
ANGELA MOSS is daydreaming, when she notices Elliot enter.
...and that’s why you always leave a note.
Nice of you to join us. By the way, did you hack my Facebook earlier?
INSERT: Gideon’s Facebook profile, embarrassing vacation photos.
Elliot ignores the question, taking a seat. Angela sinks in her seat, guilty.
Cover your tracks better, next time.

FLASHBACK: Angela successfully guesses Gideon’s Facebook password: password1234. She uses his profile to harass the admin of the Mister Rogers’ Neighborhood fan page. She makes no effort to cover her tracks.
I won’t be your neighbor. I won’t.
A CNN broadcast gets conveniently LOUDER from a TV in the nearby hallway, moving the plot forward.
...officials say the notorious hacker group Fsociety is responsible for the massive leak of sensitive Evil Corp documents...
Gideon’s phone BUZZES with a text.
TYRELL WELLICK: Not again. U r fired.
Barring some miracle, that’s it. It was nice while it lasted. I think.

The Fsociety HACKERS are all gathered around two TVs. One is playing a DVD of FIGHT CLUB, while the other shows a news broadcast with a banner that reads: NEW SURVEY FINDS NEWS BANNERS MOST TRUSTED SOURCE FOR STORY EXPOSITION.
